title: Steelworker
creator_credit: Australian National Film Board, Maslyn Williams and Hugh McInnes
brief_description: a steelworker relates his impression of life centred around the blast furnace of the Port Kembla district. He recalls the processes involved in steel making, mentions the number of ‘new’ Australians employed at the works, and tells of the facilities for recreation, entertainment and modern living provided by the principal city of the are, Wollongong.
